Item: The chapter makes its purpose clearly evident.
The chapter does not include information or content that distracts from it's purpose.
The chapter uses common, everyday language.
Technical terms are used only to familiarize reader with the terms. When used, such terms are defined.
Numbers appearing in the material are clear and easy to understand.
The text does not expect the reader to perform calculations.
The chapter breaks information into short sections.
Information is presented in a logical sequence.
